database.name: VIEW ALMAC_CAMBIAPRECIO
database.view: SELECT asi.m_attributesetinstance_id AS almac_cambiaprecio_id, asi.isactive, asi.updatedby, asi.createdby, asi.updated, asi.created, asi.ad_org_id, tr.ad_client_id, tr.m_product_id, tr.m_attributesetinstance_id, asi.em_almac_fechaentrada AS fecha_entrada, asi.em_almac_costo_realusd AS costo_real, asi.em_almac_calidad_p_id AS almac_calidad_p_id, loc.m_warehouse_id, loc.m_locator_id, loc.isdefault AS cambia_precio FROM (SELECT DISTINCT m_transaction.m_product_id, m_transaction.m_attributesetinstance_id, m_transaction.ad_client_id FROM m_transaction) tr LEFT JOIN m_storage_detail sd ON sd.m_product_id = tr.m_product_id AND sd.m_attributesetinstance_id = tr.m_attributesetinstance_id LEFT JOIN m_attributesetinstance asi ON asi.m_attributesetinstance_id = tr.m_attributesetinstance_id LEFT JOIN m_locator loc ON loc.m_locator_id = sd.m_locator_id
